tier.item: (1) a. Tonoi ketok awake dheeni/j nggon kaca. (Peranakan)
Tonoi ketok awake dheeni/j nggon kaca.
Tono saw himself in the mirror.
b. Tonoi weruh dheweke dhewei/j neng kaca. (Pribumi)
Tonoi weruh dheweke dhewei/j neng kaca.
Tono saw himself in the mirror.
a. Bowoj ngomong nek aku pikir [Tonoi ketok awake dheen nggon kaca].
Bowo N-say that 1sg think Tono see body-3 3sg in mirror
'Bowo said that I thought that Tono saw himself/him in the mirror.'
(2) a. Bowoj ngomong nek aku pikir [Tonoi ketok awake dheen i/j/k nggon kaca].
Bowo N-say that 1sg think Tono see body-3 3sg in mirror
'Bowo said that I thought that Tono saw himself/him in the mirror.'
Bowoj ngomong nek aku pikir [Tonoi ketok awake dheen i/j/k nggon kaca].
Bowo N-say that 1sg think Tono see body-3 3sg in mirror
Bowo said that I thought that Tono saw himself/him in the mirror.
b. Bowoj ngomong yen aku pikir [Tonoi weruh dheweke dhewei/j/k neng kaca].
Bowo N-say that 1sg think Tono look.at 3sg self/alone in mirror
'Bowo said that I thought that Tono saw himself/him alone.'
b. Bowoj ngomong yen aku pikir [Tonoi weruh dheweke dhewei/j/k neng kaca].
Bowo N-say that 1sg think Tono look.at 3sg self/alone in mirror
'Bowo said that I thought that Tono saw himself/him alone.'
Bowoj ngomong yen aku pikir [Tonoi weruh dheweke dhewei/j/k neng kaca].
Bowo N-say that 1sg think Tono look.at 3sg self/alone in mirror
Bowo said that I thought that Tono saw himself/him alone.
a. Tono muji awake dheen. Siti yaya. (Peranakan)
a. Tono muji awake dheen. Siti yaya. (Peranakan)
Tono muji awake dheen. Siti yaya.
b. Tono muji dheweke dhewe. Siti ya iya. (Pribumi)
Tono N-praise 3sg self/alone Siti yes also
b. Tono muji dheweke dhewe. Siti ya iya. (Pribumi)
Tono N-praise 3sg self/alone Siti yes also
Tono muji dheweke dhewe. Siti ya iya.
Tono N-praise 3sg self/alone Siti yes also
